questions.quote: A leg man? Why would I be a leg man? I don't need legs. I have legs. Have you ever seen her naked in the locker room?
Y'know I can think of at *least* six known offensive odours that I would *rather* smell than what's livin' in your car.
I am not! What you call wasting, I call living! I'm living my life!
I'm just getting warmed up. Because I'm just a sadist with newer magazines.
Well, he's getting credit for work that I did! He's gonna sidle me right out of a job.
I can feel his blood inside of me. Borrowing things from my blood.
Hey Carl, I also need you to go to Elaine's and bring my old couch back.
There was a box of raisins on the coffee table. Did you, by any chance, take them with you when left?
Hi, how are you guys? Listen, does either one of you have like a mint or piece of gum or...
Hey - Hey Kramer, what are you doing? You want to borrow something? You want to eat something? Come on in!
